name: CLOUD-009
description:
CLOUD-009 is a scrolling shooter game that takes you on an adventure through space to save the universe from a great danger that could destroy the galaxy! 

This game was developed for a college project. it lacks a few features I had planned due to time constraints for the project but I do hope to add these features in future updates when I can find the time for it!

(The game lacks sound as of its current state. I will add sound in the next update.)
